original_title: Bide bazterrean hi eta ni kantari
overview: "Look for the part that's missing from this book; there, somewhere in your house it's kept. I've tried to walk as far as halfway between you and I; I can't carry on. The respect I bear for what's yours does not let me go any further", Joxean Artze.
title: Bide bazterrean hi eta ni kantari
